FAQdata.A:
Orion is a fully integrated services platform that offers you whatever service you need through our network of service providers and through Orion itself.
Orion is a cost-efficient solution as we provide the same services from the service providers but at a lower cost.
For more details on our offerings, please check our services page for our full range of services and their prices.

For a seamless booking, pick the service you need from our services page and call us on 16286 to make the reservation.
For more details on our offerings, please check our services page for our full range of services and their prices.

FAQdata.Q: How much do our services cost?
FAQdata.A:
You can check our services page for our full range of services and their prices
You can also call us on 16286 or chat with us through WhatsApp on the number +201101016286.
Orion offers its services in Madinaty, Rehab, 5th, 3rd, and 1st Settlement, and El Shrouk city.

FAQdata.Q: Who are the service providers/partners network?
FAQdata.A:
We have a wide network of service providers tailored to meet all your needs. You can check our Partners page to check the full list.
For more details and bookings, please call us on 16286 or chat with us through WhatsApp on the number +201101016286.
